001import javax.swing.*;
002import java.awt.*;
003import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
004import java.awt.event.*;
005import java.net.URL;
006import java.awt.image.*;
007import javax.swing.JButton;
008import java.util.ArrayList;
009
010/**
011 * Moteur du jeu qui implémente une interface graphique
012 * 
013 * @author Michael Kolling
014 * @version 2.0, 02/08/2024
015 */
016public class UserInterface {
017    /**
018     * Référence à GameEngine
019     */
020    private GameEngine aEngine;
021
022    private JLabel aImage;
023    
024    private JFrame aFrame;
025    private JTextArea aLog;
026    private EntryField aEntryField;
027    private JPanel aImagePanel;
028    
029    private LookButton aLookButton;
030    private UseButton aUseButton;
031    private TakeButton aTakeButton;
032    private DropButton aDropButton;
033    private InfoButton aInfoButton;
034    private TradeButton aTradeButton;
035    private WriteButton aWriteButton;
036    private TalkButton aTalkButton;
037    
038    private ArrayList<JButton> aButtonArray;
039    private ArrayList<JButton> aCommandsButtonArray;
040    private ArrayList<JButton> aDirectionButtonArray;
041    
042    private ClearButton aClearButton;
043    
044    private double aWidthUnite;
045    private double aHeightUnite;
046    
047    private Color aBGColor;
048    private Color aTextColor;
049    private Color aHoverBGColor;
050    private Color aHoverTextColor;
051
052    /**
053     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
054     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is
055     * needed.
056     * 
057     * @param pGameEngine  The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
058     */
059    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
060    {
061        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
062        this.createGUI();
063    } // UserInterface(.)
064
065    /**
066     * Show an image file in the interface.
067     * @param pImageName Le nom de l'image
068     */
069    public void showImage(final String pImageName) {
070        String vImagePath = "assets/images/" + pImageName + ".jpeg"; // to change the directory
071        // URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource(vImagePath);
072        // if ( vImageURL == null )
073            // System.out.println("Image not found : " + vImagePath);
074        // else {
075            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImagePath );
076            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
077            this.aImagePanel.add(this.aImage);
078            this.aFrame.pack();
079        // }
080        
081        // ImageIcon imageIcon = new ImageIcon("assets/images/" + pImageName + ".jpg"); // load the image to a imageIcon
082        // System.out.println(imageIcon);
083        // Image image = imageIcon.getImage(); // transform it 
084        // Image newimg = image.getScaledInstance((int)(4 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(5 * this.aHeightUnite),  java.awt.Image.SCALE_SMOOTH); // scale it the smooth way  
085        // imageIcon = new ImageIcon(newimg);
086        // this.aImage.setIcon(imageIcon);
087        // this.aImagePanel.add(this.aImage);
088    } // showImage(.)
089
090    /**
091     * Interface utilisateur
092     */
093    private void createGUI() {
094        this.aFrame = new JFrame("Violet Evergarden");
095        SwingUtilities.invokeLater(() -> {
096           this.aFrame.setVisible(true); 
097        });
098        
099        this.aFrame.setTitle("Violet Evergarden");
100        this.aFrame.setSize(1280, 720);
101        this.aFrame.setMinimumSize(new Dimension(1280, 720));
102        this.aFrame.setMaximumSize(new Dimension(1280, 720));
103        this.aFrame.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(1280, 720));
104        this.aFrame.setState(JFrame.NORMAL);
105        this.aFrame.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
106        this.aFrame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
107        this.aFrame.setResizable(false);
108        
109        ImageIcon imageIcon = new ImageIcon("assets/images/logo2.png"); // load the image to a imageIcon
110        Image image = imageIcon.getImage(); // transform it 
111        Image newimg = image.getScaledInstance(150, 150,  java.awt.Image.SCALE_SMOOTH); // scale it the smooth way
112        this.aFrame.setIconImage(newimg);
113        
114        this.aImage = new JLabel();
115
116        this.aBGColor = new Color(51, 51, 51);
117        this.aTextColor = new Color(240, 240, 240);
118        this.aHoverBGColor = new Color(40, 40, 40);
119        this.aHoverTextColor = new Color(150, 150, 150);
120        
121        // Ajout des composants et des evenements
122        this.createForm();
123        
124        // to end program when window is closed
125        this.aFrame.addWindowListener(
126            new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
127                @Override public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE)
128                {
129                    System.exit(0);
130                }
131        } );
132
133        // this.aFrame.pack();
134        this.aFrame.setVisible( true );
135        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
136    } // createGUI()
137
138    private void createForm() {
139        // Panel Creation
140        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
141        GridBagConstraints c = new GridBagConstraints();
142        vPanel.setBackground(new Color(0, 0, 0));
143        vPanel.setLayout(new GridBagLayout());
144        
145        // JFrame Dimension
146        Dimension vFrameDim = this.aFrame.getSize();
147        double vFrameWidth = vFrameDim.getWidth();
148        double vFrameHeight = vFrameDim.getHeight();
149        
150        this.aWidthUnite = vFrameWidth / 15;
151        this.aHeightUnite = vFrameHeight / 15;
152        
153        this.aImagePanel = new JPanel();
154        JPanel vButtonPanel = new JPanel();
155        JPanel vMapPanel = new JPanel();
156        JPanel vTextAreaPanel = new JPanel();
157        JPanel vOtherPanel = new JPanel();
158        JPanel vClearPanel = new JPanel();
159        JPanel vTextFieldPanel = new JPanel();
160        
161        this.aDirectionButtonArray = new ArrayList();
162        this.aCommandsButtonArray = new ArrayList();
163        this.aButtonArray = new ArrayList();
164
165        c.weightx = 1;
166        c.weighty = 1;
167        c.ipadx = 0;
168        c.ipady = 0;
169        
170        // Set up the panels
171        this.setupImagePanel(vPanel, this.aImagePanel, c);
172        
173        this.setupTextAreaPanel(vPanel, vTextAreaPanel, c);
174        
175        this.setupButtonPanel(vPanel, vButtonPanel, c);
176        
177        this.setupReadmePanel(vPanel, vButtonPanel, c);
178        
179        this.setupMapPanel(vPanel, vMapPanel, c);
180        
181        this.setupOtherPanel(vPanel, vOtherPanel, c);
182        
183        this.setupClearPanel(vPanel, vClearPanel, c);
184        
185        this.setupTextFieldPanel(vPanel, vTextFieldPanel, c);
186
187        
188        this.addAllButtonsEventListeners();
189        // this.addTextFieldListener();
190        
191        
192        this.aFrame.getContentPane().add(vPanel);
193    }
194    
195    private void setupImagePanel(final JPanel pMainPanel, final JPanel pPanel, final GridBagConstraints pC) {
196        this.aImage = new JLabel();
197        
198        pPanel.setMinimumSize(new Dimension((int)(10 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(10 * this.aHeightUnite)));
199        pPanel.setMaximumSize(new Dimension((int)(10 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(10 * this.aHeightUnite)));
200        pPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension((int)(10 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(10 * this.aHeightUnite)));
201        pPanel.setBackground(new Color(230, 230, 230));
202        pPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
203        
204        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
205        pC.gridx = 0;
206        pC.gridy = 0;
207        pC.gridwidth = 10;
208        pC.gridheight = 10;
209        
210        pPanel.add(this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH);
211        
212        pMainPanel.add(pPanel, pC);
213    }
214    
215    private void setupButtonPanel(final JPanel pMainPanel, final JPanel pPanel, final GridBagConstraints pC) {
216        pPanel.setMinimumSize(new Dimension((int)(4 * this.aWidthUnite) - 1, (int)(10 * this.aHeightUnite)));
217        pPanel.setMaximumSize(new Dimension((int)(4 * this.aWidthUnite) - 1, (int)(10 * this.aHeightUnite)));
218        pPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension((int)(4 * this.aWidthUnite) - 1, (int)(10 * this.aHeightUnite)));
219        pPanel.setBackground(this.aBGColor);
220        pPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
221        
222        this.setupCommandsPanel(pMainPanel, pPanel, pC);
223        this.setupDirectionPanel(pMainPanel, pPanel, pC);
224        
225        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
226        pC.gridx = 10;
227        pC.gridy = 0;
228        pC.gridwidth = 4;
229        pC.gridheight = 10;
230        
231        pMainPanel.add(pPanel, pC);
232    }
233    
234    private void setupCommandsPanel(final JPanel pMainPanel, final JPanel pButtonPanel, final GridBagConstraints pC) {
235        JPanel vCommandsPanel = new JPanel();
236        
237        vCommandsPanel.setMinimumSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(3 * this.aHeightUnite)));
238        vCommandsPanel.setMaximumSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(3 * this.aHeightUnite)));
239        vCommandsPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(3 * this.aHeightUnite)));
240        vCommandsPanel.setBackground(this.aBGColor);
241        vCommandsPanel.setLayout(new GridBagLayout());
242        
243        JButton vBackButton = new JButton("back");
244        JButton vChargeButton = new JButton("charge");
245        
246        this.aLookButton = new LookButton("look", this);
247        this.aUseButton = new UseButton("use", this);
248        this.aTakeButton = new TakeButton("take", this);
249        this.aDropButton = new DropButton("drop", this);
250        this.aInfoButton = new InfoButton("info", this);
251        this.aTradeButton = new TradeButton("trade", this);
252        this.aWriteButton = new WriteButton("write", this);
253        this.aTalkButton = new TalkButton("talk", this);
254        
255        this.aButtonArray.add(vBackButton);
256        this.aButtonArray.add(vChargeButton);
257        this.aButtonArray.add(this.aLookButton);
258        this.aButtonArray.add(this.aUseButton);
259        this.aButtonArray.add(this.aTakeButton);
260        this.aButtonArray.add(this.aDropButton);
261        this.aButtonArray.add(this.aInfoButton);
262        this.aButtonArray.add(this.aTradeButton);
263        this.aButtonArray.add(this.aWriteButton);
264        this.aButtonArray.add(this.aTalkButton);
265        
266        this.aCommandsButtonArray.add(vBackButton);
267        this.aCommandsButtonArray.add(vChargeButton);
268        this.aCommandsButtonArray.add(this.aLookButton);
269        this.aCommandsButtonArray.add(this.aUseButton);
270        this.aCommandsButtonArray.add(this.aTakeButton);
271        this.aCommandsButtonArray.add(this.aDropButton);
272        this.aCommandsButtonArray.add(this.aInfoButton);
273        this.aCommandsButtonArray.add(this.aTradeButton);
274        this.aCommandsButtonArray.add(this.aWriteButton);
275        this.aCommandsButtonArray.add(this.aTalkButton);
276        
277        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
278        pC.gridx = 0;
279        pC.gridy = 0;
280        pC.gridwidth = 1;
281        pC.gridheight = 1;
282        vCommandsPanel.add(vBackButton, pC);
283        
284        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
285        pC.gridx = 1;
286        pC.gridy = 0;
287        pC.gridwidth = 1;
288        pC.gridheight = 1;
289        vCommandsPanel.add(this.aTakeButton, pC);
290        
291        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
292        pC.gridx = 2;
293        pC.gridy = 0;
294        pC.gridwidth = 1;
295        pC.gridheight = 1;
296        vCommandsPanel.add(this.aUseButton, pC);
297        
298        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
299        pC.gridx = 3;
300        pC.gridy = 0;
301        pC.gridwidth = 1;
302        pC.gridheight = 1;
303        vCommandsPanel.add(this.aLookButton, pC);
304        
305        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
306        pC.gridx = 4;
307        pC.gridy = 0;
308        pC.gridwidth = 1;
309        pC.gridheight = 1;
310        vCommandsPanel.add(this.aTalkButton, pC);
311        
312        
313        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
314        pC.gridx = 0;
315        pC.gridy = 1;
316        pC.gridwidth = 1;
317        pC.gridheight = 1;
318        vCommandsPanel.add(vChargeButton, pC);
319        
320        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
321        pC.gridx = 1;
322        pC.gridy = 1;
323        pC.gridwidth = 1;
324        pC.gridheight = 1;
325        vCommandsPanel.add(this.aDropButton, pC);
326        
327        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
328        pC.gridx = 2;
329        pC.gridy = 1;
330        pC.gridwidth = 1;
331        pC.gridheight = 1;
332        vCommandsPanel.add(this.aTradeButton, pC);
333        
334        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
335        pC.gridx = 3;
336        pC.gridy = 1;
337        pC.gridwidth = 1;
338        pC.gridheight = 1;
339        vCommandsPanel.add(this.aInfoButton, pC);
340        
341        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
342        pC.gridx = 4;
343        pC.gridy = 1;
344        pC.gridwidth = 1;
345        pC.gridheight = 1;
346        vCommandsPanel.add(this.aWriteButton, pC);
347        
348        pButtonPanel.add(vCommandsPanel, BorderLayout.NORTH);
349    }

351    private void setupReadmePanel(final JPanel pMainPanel, final JPanel pButtonPanel, final GridBagConstraints pC) {
352        ReadmeButton vReadmeButton = new ReadmeButton();
353        this.aButtonArray.add(vReadmeButton);
354        
355        pButtonPanel.add(vReadmeButton, BorderLayout.CENTER);
356    }
357    
358    private void setupDirectionPanel(final JPanel pMainPanel, final JPanel pButtonPanel, final GridBagConstraints pC) {
359        JPanel vDirectionPanel = new JPanel();
360        
361        vDirectionPanel.setMinimumSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(5 * this.aHeightUnite)));
362        vDirectionPanel.setMaximumSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(5 * this.aHeightUnite)));
363        vDirectionPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(5 * this.aHeightUnite)));
364        vDirectionPanel.setBackground(this.aBGColor);
365        vDirectionPanel.setLayout(new GridBagLayout());
366        
367        JButton vNButton = new DirectionButton("nord", this);
368        JButton vSButton = new DirectionButton("sud", this);
369        JButton vEButton = new DirectionButton("est", this);
370        JButton vWButton = new DirectionButton("ouest", this);
371        JButton vNEButton = new DirectionButton("nordest", this);
372        JButton vNWButton = new DirectionButton("nordouest", this);
373        JButton vSEButton = new DirectionButton("sudest", this);
374        JButton vSWButton = new DirectionButton("sudouest", this);
375        JButton vUButton = new DirectionButton("haut", this);
376        JButton vDButton = new DirectionButton("bas", this);
377        
378        this.aButtonArray.add(vNButton);
379        this.aButtonArray.add(vSButton);
380        this.aButtonArray.add(vEButton);
381        this.aButtonArray.add(vWButton);
382        this.aButtonArray.add(vNEButton);
383        this.aButtonArray.add(vNWButton);
384        this.aButtonArray.add(vSEButton);
385        this.aButtonArray.add(vSWButton);
386        this.aButtonArray.add(vUButton);
387        this.aButtonArray.add(vDButton);
388        
389        this.aDirectionButtonArray.add(vNButton);
390        this.aDirectionButtonArray.add(vSButton);
391        this.aDirectionButtonArray.add(vEButton);
392        this.aDirectionButtonArray.add(vWButton);
393        this.aDirectionButtonArray.add(vNEButton);
394        this.aDirectionButtonArray.add(vNWButton);
395        this.aDirectionButtonArray.add(vSEButton);
396        this.aDirectionButtonArray.add(vSWButton);
397        this.aDirectionButtonArray.add(vUButton);
398        this.aDirectionButtonArray.add(vDButton);
399        
400        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
401        pC.gridx = 2;
402        pC.gridy = 0;
403        pC.gridwidth = 2;
404        pC.gridheight = 2;
405        vDirectionPanel.add(vNButton, pC);
406        
407        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
408        pC.gridx = 0;
409        pC.gridy = 0;
410        pC.gridwidth = 2;
411        pC.gridheight = 2;
412        vDirectionPanel.add(vNWButton, pC);
413        
414        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
415        pC.gridx = 4;
416        pC.gridy = 0;
417        pC.gridwidth = 2;
418        pC.gridheight = 2;
419        vDirectionPanel.add(vNEButton, pC);
420        
421        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
422        pC.gridx = 4;
423        pC.gridy = 2;
424        pC.gridwidth = 2;
425        pC.gridheight = 2;
426        vDirectionPanel.add(vEButton, pC);
427        
428        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
429        pC.gridx = 0;
430        pC.gridy = 2;
431        pC.gridwidth = 2;
432        pC.gridheight = 2;
433        vDirectionPanel.add(vWButton, pC);
434        
435        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
436        pC.gridx = 0;
437        pC.gridy = 4;
438        pC.gridwidth = 2;
439        pC.gridheight = 2;
440        vDirectionPanel.add(vSWButton, pC);
441        
442        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
443        pC.gridx = 2;
444        pC.gridy = 4;
445        pC.gridwidth = 2;
446        pC.gridheight = 2;
447        vDirectionPanel.add(vSButton, pC);
448        
449        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
450        pC.gridx = 4;
451        pC.gridy = 4;
452        pC.gridwidth = 2;
453        pC.gridheight = 2;
454        vDirectionPanel.add(vSEButton, pC);
455        
456        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
457        pC.gridx = 2;
458        pC.gridy = 2;
459        pC.gridwidth = 2;
460        pC.gridheight = 1;
461        vDirectionPanel.add(vUButton, pC);
462        
463        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;

465        pC.gridy = 3;
466        pC.gridwidth = 2;
467        pC.gridheight = 1;
468        vDirectionPanel.add(vDButton, pC);
469        
470        pButtonPanel.add(vDirectionPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
471    }
472    
473    private void setupMapPanel(final JPanel pMainPanel, final JPanel pPanel, final GridBagConstraints pC) {
474        pPanel.setMinimumSize(new Dimension((int)(4 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(5 * this.aHeightUnite)));
475        pPanel.setMaximumSize(new Dimension((int)(4 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(5 * this.aHeightUnite)));
476        pPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension((int)(4 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(5 * this.aHeightUnite)));
477        pPanel.setBackground(new Color(144, 128, 224));
478        pPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
479        
480        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
481        pC.gridx = 10;
482        pC.gridy = 10;
483        pC.gridwidth = 4;
484        pC.gridheight = 5;
485        
486        pPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
487        
488        ImageIcon imageIcon = new ImageIcon("assets/images/WorldMap_WithoutNames.jpg"); // load the image to a imageIcon
489        Image image = imageIcon.getImage(); // transform it 
490        Image newimg = image.getScaledInstance(366, 215,  java.awt.Image.SCALE_SMOOTH); // scale it the smooth way  
491        imageIcon = new ImageIcon(newimg);
492        
493        JLabel vImg = new JLabel("");
494        vImg.setIcon(imageIcon);
495        
496        pPanel.add(vImg, BorderLayout.CENTER);
497        
498        pMainPanel.add(pPanel, pC);
499    }
500    
501    private void setupTextAreaPanel(final JPanel pMainPanel, final JPanel pPanel, final GridBagConstraints pC) {
502        pPanel.setMinimumSize(new Dimension((int)(7 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(5 * this.aHeightUnite)));
503        pPanel.setMaximumSize(new Dimension((int)(7 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(5 * this.aHeightUnite)));
504        pPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension((int)(7 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(5 * this.aHeightUnite)));
505        pPanel.setBackground(new Color(68, 182, 43));
506        pPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
507        
508        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
509        pC.gridx = 0;
510        pC.gridy = 10;
511        pC.gridwidth = 7;
512        pC.gridheight = 5;
513        
514        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
515        this.aLog.setEditable(false);
516        this.aLog.setBackground(this.aTextColor);
517        this.aLog.setForeground(this.aBGColor);
518        Module.setFontSize(this.aLog, 15);
519        JScrollPane vScrollPane = new JScrollPane(this.aLog);
520        pPanel.add(vScrollPane, BorderLayout.CENTER);
521        
522        pMainPanel.add(pPanel, pC);
523    }
524    
525    private void setupOtherPanel(final JPanel pMainPanel, final JPanel pPanel, final GridBagConstraints pC) {
526        pPanel.setMinimumSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(3 * this.aHeightUnite)));
527        pPanel.setMaximumSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(3 * this.aHeightUnite)));
528        pPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(3 * this.aHeightUnite)));
529        pPanel.setBackground(new Color(245, 164, 19));
530        pPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
531        
532        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
533        pC.gridx = 7;
534        pC.gridy = 10;
535        pC.gridwidth = 3;
536        pC.gridheight = 3;
537        
538        ImageIcon imageIcon = new ImageIcon("assets/images/game_image.png"); // load the image to a imageIcon
539        Image image = imageIcon.getImage(); // transform it 
540        Image newimg = image.getScaledInstance(281, 144,  java.awt.Image.SCALE_SMOOTH); // scale it the smooth way  
541        imageIcon = new ImageIcon(newimg);
542        
543        JLabel vImg = new JLabel("");
544        vImg.setIcon(imageIcon);
545        
546        pPanel.add(vImg, BorderLayout.CENTER);
547        
548        pMainPanel.add(pPanel, pC);
549    }
550    
551    private void setupClearPanel(final JPanel pMainPanel, final JPanel pPanel, final GridBagConstraints pC) {
552        pPanel.setMinimumSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(this.aHeightUnite)));
553        pPanel.setMaximumSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(this.aHeightUnite)));
554        pPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(this.aHeightUnite)));
555        pPanel.setBackground(new Color(144, 116, 68));
556        pPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
557        
558        this.aClearButton = new ClearButton("effacer", this.aLog);
559        this.aButtonArray.add(this.aClearButton);
560        
561        pPanel.add(this.aClearButton, BorderLayout.CENTER);
562        
563        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
564        pC.gridx = 7;
565        pC.gridy = 13;
566        pC.gridwidth = 3;
567        pC.gridheight = 1;
568        pMainPanel.add(pPanel, pC);
569    }
570    
571    private void setupTextFieldPanel(final JPanel pMainPanel, final JPanel pPanel, final GridBagConstraints pC) {
572        pPanel.setMinimumSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(this.aHeightUnite)));
573        pPanel.setMaximumSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(this.aHeightUnite)));
574        pPanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension((int)(3 * this.aWidthUnite), (int)(this.aHeightUnite)));
575        pPanel.setBackground(new Color(255, 39, 15));
576        pPanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
577        
578        this.aEntryField = new EntryField(20, this);
579        
580        this.aEntryField.setBackground(this.aTextColor);
581        this.aEntryField.setForeground(this.aBGColor);
582        
583        pC.fill = GridBagConstraints.BOTH;
584        pC.gridx = 7;
585        pC.gridy = 14;
586        pC.gridwidth = 3;
587        pC.gridheight = 1;
588        
589        Module.setFontSize(this.aEntryField, 15);
590        pPanel.add(this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.CENTER);
591        
592        pMainPanel.add(pPanel, pC);
593    }
594    
595    
596    private void addAllButtonsEventListeners() {
597        UserInterface t = this;
598        for(JButton vButton : this.aButtonArray) {
599            
600            vButton.setBorderPainted(false);
601            vButton.setFocusPainted(false);
602            Module.setFontSize(vButton, 14);
603            vButton.setCursor(new Cursor(Cursor.HAND_CURSOR));
604            
605            if(vButton instanceof PopupButton) {
606                continue;
607            }
608            vButton.setBackground(this.aBGColor);
609            vButton.setForeground(this.aTextColor);
610            vButton.addMouseListener(new MouseListener() {
611                @Override
612                public void mousePressed(MouseEvent e) {
613                }
614                
615                @Override
616                public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent e) {
617                }
618                
619                @Override
620                public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent e) {
621                    
622                    vButton.setBackground(t.aHoverBGColor);
623                    vButton.setForeground(t.aHoverTextColor);
624                }
625                
626                @Override
627                public void mouseExited(MouseEvent e) {
628                    vButton.setBackground(t.aBGColor);
629                    vButton.setForeground(t.aTextColor);
630                }
631                
632                @Override
633                public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) {
634                    t.aLog.setCaretPosition(t.aLog.getDocument().getLength());
635                    if(vButton.getText().equals("back") || vButton.getText().equals("charge")) {
636                        t.aEngine.interpretCommand(vButton.getText());
637                    }
638                }
639            });
640        }
641    }
642    
643    public void enable(final boolean pOnOff) {
644        this.aEntryField.setEnabled(pOnOff);
645        for(JButton vButton : this.aButtonArray) {
646            vButton.setEnabled(pOnOff);
647        }
648    }
649    
650    public void print(final String pStr) {
651        this.aLog.append(pStr);
652    }
653    
654    public void println(final String pStr) {
655        this.print(pStr + "\n");
656    }
657

664    }
